panels.content:
Operational information about the [WDQS](https://query.wikidata.org/).

 - Lag & Tripple counts retrieved using a SPARQL query to each host.
 - Other metrics are direct from blazegraph
   - querySuccessCount is derived from queryDoneCount  and queryErrorCount.
   - All of these counts include ALL queries to the service (Note: updating the data held in the service is counted as a query)
panels.title: Description
Lag
Triples
